duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist with tracking and maintaining deliverables across global partnerships
Support Partner Managers in managing and delivering specific assets
Gather metrics and utilize data insights related to partner performance and asset value
Design templates and build partner recaps for proof of performance
Collaborate and communicate with internal departments cross functionally
Collate necessary information and contractual partner obligations
Work at live events as support staff for partners

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business, or related field (Master's preferred)
